description:
Cait Sith is a giant humanoid cat that resides in Neo Venezia. Throughout the series, the people of Neo Venezia share many folk stories on how the cats of city contribute to its mystique. Cait Sith is said to be the leader of these cats, creating fantasies for those individuals deemed deserving and suitable to bear witness to them.
Throughout the series, especially in http://anidb.net/a4243 [Aria the Natural], http://anidb.net/ch1286 [Mizunashi Akari] has several fantastical encounters with the cats of Neo Venezia and with Cait Sith himself. http://anidb.net/ch8501 [Aino Ai] also has a few encounters of her own. As Akari graduates and becomes a Prima Undine, her ability to encounter fantasies and Cait Sith fade away.
â€” written by CDB-Man
name: Cait Sith
